original_text: Then Balaam said to the angel of the Lord, “I have sinned, for I did not know that you stood in the road against me. Now therefore, if it is evil in your sight, I will turn back.”
korean_text: 발람이 여호와의 사자에게 말하되 내가 범죄하였나이다 당신이 나를 막으려고 길에 서신 줄을 내가 알지 못하였나이다 당신이 이를 기뻐하지 아니하시면 나는 돌아가겠나이다

sentences.original_text: Then Balaam said to the angel of the Lord,
that you stood in the road against me.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 길 가운데 서서 나를 대적한 것을

sentences.original_text: if it is evil in your sight,
